question: What are the social media engagement metrics for the companies in the technology sector?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector by querying the CompanyInfo table to filter by the industry column for 'Technology'.

Gather Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments, reposts) for the filtered technology companies by joining the CompanyInfo table with CompanyFacebookDetail. Ensure to include relevant identifiers for tracking.
Collect similar engagement metrics from Instagram for the same technology companies by joining the CompanyInfo table with CompanyInstagramDetail. Include relevant metrics for comparative analysis.
Sum all engagement metrics from Facebook and Instagram to provide a total engagement score for each technology company to better analyze overall social media presence.

Determine the data type of the engagement metrics and format it for reporting purposes. Also, evaluate if any additional social media platforms (Twitter, YouTube) need to be included for a comprehensive view.
